K01vinv15_u:326: sā cāṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
K01vinv15_u:328: tasya trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate;
K01vinv15_u:331: ayaṃ dārako dattasya gṛhapateḥ putras tasmād bhavatu dārakasya sudatta iti nāmeti;
K01vinv15_u:338: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṃkajam;
K01vinv15_u:339: so 'pareṇa samayena sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣito dhātryaṃsagato niṣaṇṇo bahirnirgataḥ;
K01vinv15_u:358: āryaputra yady evaṃ nainaṃ bhūyo 'py alaṃkariṣyāmi;
K01vinv15_u:360: bhadre asty asmākaṃ suvarṇam aprameyaṃ ratnāni ca;
K01vinv15_u:365: yāvad apareṇa samayena datto gṛhapatir bhṛtyajanaparivṛto (MSV III 135)
K01vinv15_u:390: tatas tenobhau pāṇī nadyām āplāvya suvarṇapūrṇās catvāro lohasaṃghāṭā uddhṛtāḥ; kathayati:
K01vinv15_u:391: tāta atas tnaṃ yāvadāptaḥṃḥ dhanena dhanakāryaṃ kṛtvāvaśiṣṭam atraiva plāvaya;
K01vinv15_u:392: putra kiṃ tvaṃ jalagatān nidhīn paśyasi?
K01vinv15_u:393: tāta na kevalaṃ jalagatān sthalagatān api sasvāmikān asvāmikān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike;
K01vinv15_u:395: śakyam evaṃvidhena dānaptinā dānaṃ dātum iti viditvā kathayati:
K01vinv15_u:396: putra yady evaṃ dehi dānaṃ yatheṣṭam iti;
K01vinv15_u:398: na tāvat putro yaśasvī bhavati yāvad asya pitā jīvatīti
K01vinv15_u:399: yāvad apareṇa samayena datto gṛhapatiḥ kālagataḥ;
K01vinv15_u:401: satatam anāthebhyaḥ piṇḍakam anuprayacchatīti samantāc chadbo visṛtaḥ:
K01vinv15_u:402: dattasya gṛhapateḥ putraḥ sudatto gṛhasvāmī saṃvrṭtaḥ; (Śay-v 13)
K01vinv15_u:406: tatas tena sadṛśāt kulāt kalatram ānitaṃ;
K01vinv15_u:407: sa tayā sārdham krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
K01vinv15_u:408: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:414: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāpro vyavasthitaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:418: kasmāt tvaṃ gṛhapate kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparas tiṣṭhasīti;
K01vinv15_u:421: saptamasya sujātasya sadṛśakulaṃ cintayāmi katarat tat kulaṃ yato 'sya niveṣaṃ kariṣyāmīti;
K01vinv15_u:423: alpotsukas tiṣṭha aham asya sadṛśaṃ kulaṃ gaveṣayāmi;
K01vinv15_u:429: rājagṛhe anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo 'nāthapiṇḍadasya pratirūpaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:430: sa tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭo dvāraśālāyāṃ sthitvā kathayati:
K01vinv15_u:436: śrāvastyām anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tasya putraḥ sujāto nāmnā;
K01vinv15_u:440: śatam aśvānāṃ śataṃ niṣkāṇāṃ śatam aśvatarīrathānāṃ śataṃ kāmbojikānāṃ kanyānām iti;
K01vinv15_u:443: tenāpi vācayitvā pratīccha sarvaṃ mayā deyam iti;
K01vinv15_u:445: tatas taiḥ śucinā praṇītena prabhūtenāhāreṇa saṃtarpito mānavakaḥ śālāṃ gatvā vāsam upagato viṣūcitaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:447: sa tair aśucibhayād bahir niṣkāsayitvā cchoritaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:448: daivād āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau taṃ pradeśam āgatau;
K01vinv15_u:450: tatas tābhyāṃ vaṃśavidalikayā nirlikhya pāṇḍumṛttikayā udvartya snāpitaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:453: sa tayor antike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ;
K01vinv15_u:455: sa vaiśravaṇasya mahārājasya sakāśaṃ gatvā bhavanaṃ prārthayate;
K01vinv15_u:457: gaccha tad eva te śivikādvāraṃ bhavanam iti;
K01vinv15_u:459: videharājena rājño biṃbisārasya haimavatānāṃ nāgānāṃ sātam anupreṣitam;
K01vinv15_u:461: mama videharājena haimavatānāṃ nāgānāṃ śatam anupreṣitam;
K01vinv15_u:463: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir yena rājā prasenajit kosalas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:464: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kosalam idam avocat:
K01vinv15_u:468: śobhanaṃ gaccha mamāpi tasmāt hastiśatam āneyaṃ (MSV III 138)
K01vinv15_u:471: deva yadi mama tatra prayojanaṃ ḥnaḥ bhavati grahīṣyāmīti;
K01vinv15_u:476: tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ prabhūtaṃ kulaśulkam ādāya rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ;
K01vinv15_u:477: sa yasya gṛhapater gṛhe vāsam upagataḥ sa gṛhapatiḥ sarātram evotthāyāntarjanam āmaṃtrayate:
K01vinv15_u:485: kiṃ punar asya gṛhapater āvāho vā vivāho vā bhaviṣyati;
K01vinv15_u:487: śreṇī vā, pūgo vā parṣado vā?
K01vinv15_u:488: rājā vānena māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ bhaktenopanimantritaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:489: iti viditvā taṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
K01vinv15_u:490: kiṃ punas te gṛhapate āvāho vā bhaviṣyati,
K01vinv15_u:491: vivāho vā rāṣṭraṃ vā tvayā bhaktenopanimantritaṃ śreṇī vā pūgo vā parṣado vā rājā vā te māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhaktenopanimantrita iti;
K01vinv15_u:493: gṛhapate na me āvāho bhaviṣyati na vivāho vā nāpi mayā rāṣṭraṃ bhaktenopanimantritaṃ,
K01vinv15_u:494: na śreṇī na pūgo na parṣado nāpi rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhaktenopanimantritaḥ api tu buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhaktenopanimantrita;
K01vinv15_u:495: iti anāthapaiṇḍadasya gṛhapater buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāny (A 318b)
K01vinv15_u:496: āhṛṣṭāni; sa āhṛṣṭaromakūpas taṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
K01vinv15_u:500: śākyakulāt keśaśmaśrū avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:504: santi gṛhapate kṣatriyakulād api kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrū avatārya kāṣāyāṇy vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anāgārikāṃ tam eva bhagavantaṃ pravrajitam anupravrajitāḥ;
K01vinv15_u:505: brāhmaṇakulād api vaiśyakulād api śūdrakulād api kulaputrāḥ keāśaśmaśrū avatārya
K01vinv15_u:506: kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā anāgārād anāgārikāṃ tam eva bhagavantaṃ
K01vinv15_u:509: ḥśvaḥḥ sa mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṅgho 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:510: kutra gṛhapate sa bhagavān etarhi viharati?
K01vinv15_u:513: tena hi gṛhapate āgamaya tāvat tvam;
K01vinv15_u:514: sthānam etad vidyate yad ihāgataṃ śvo drakṣyasi;
K01vinv15_u:515: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tāṃ rātriṃ buddhālambanayā smṛtyā middham avakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:517: tena khalu samayena śivakadvāraṃ rātryā dvau yāmau vivṛtaṃ tiṣṭhati;
K01vinv15_u:519: māhaiva āgantukānāṃ gamikānāṃ ca dūtānāṃ vighno bhaviṣyatīti;
K01vinv15_u:520: yāvat paśyati śivakadvāraṃ vivṛtam ālokena ca sphuṭam;
K01vinv15_u:524: iti viditvā tenaiva ālokena nagarān niṣkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:531: māhaiva kaścid viheṭayen manuṣyo vāmanuṣyo vā dhūrtako vā asaṃprāptam vā syāt prabhūtaṃ kulaśulkam iti;
K01vinv15_u:532: viditvā pratinivartitukāmo madhuskandhasya devaputrasya sthaṇḍilaṃ pradakṣiṇīkaroti,
K01vinv15_u:536: adyaivāyaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantam apāsya anyadevatānamaskāraṃ kariṣyati;
K01vinv15_u:537: iti viditvā yāvacca śivakadvāraṃ yavac ca śītavanaṃ śmaśānam atrāntarād udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
K01vinv15_u:543: śatam aśvā śataṃ niṣkāḥ śatam aśvatarīrathāḥ /
K01vinv15_u:567: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis taṃ devaputram idam avocat:
K01vinv15_u:569: aham asmi gṛhapate madhuskandho nāma māṇavaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:571: so 'haṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanayor bhikṣvor antike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataś cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ,
K01vinv15_u:580: yatredānīṃ devatā api autsukyam āpadyante tasya bhagavato darśanāya;
K01vinv15_u:581: iti viditvā yena śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:582: tena khalu samayena bahir vihārasyābhyavakāśe bhagavān caṅkrameṇa caṅkramyate,
K01vinv15_u:584: adrākṣīd anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavantam durād eva;
K01vinv15_u:585: dṛṣṭvā ca punar yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:586: upasaṅkramya bhagavantam gṛhapatiḥ pratisaṃmodanayā pratisammodate: (MSV III 142)
K01vinv15_u:588: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate;
K01vinv15_u:589: sarvathā vai sukhaṃ śete brāhmaṇaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ / (Śay-v 17)
K01vinv15_u:590: lipyate yo na kāmair hi vipramukto nirupadhiḥ //
K01vinv15_u:593: atha bhagavān anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim ādāya vihāraṃ praviśya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:594: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhpatir bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:595: ekānte niṣaṇṇam anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā sandarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati,
K01vinv15_u:597: yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvakālakaraṇīyā dharmyā kathā,
K01vinv15_u:598: tadyathā dānakathā śīlakathā svargakathā kāmānām āsvādādīnavasaṃkleśavyavadānanaiṣkramyapraviveka anuśaṃsavyavadānapakṣyān dharmān vistareṇa
K01vinv15_u:599: yadā cainaṃ bhagavān adrākṣīt hṛṣṭacittaṃ kalyacittaṃ muditacittaṃ vinivaraṇacittaṃ bhavyaṃ pratibalaṃ sāmutkarṣikīṃ dharmadeśanām ājñātum,
K01vinv15_u:600: tadā yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sāmutkarṣikī dharmadeśanā tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāni vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
K01vinv15_u:601: athānāthapiṇḍado gḥapatis tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇaś catvaṛy āryasatyāny abhisameti;
K01vinv15_u:603: tasyathā śuddhaṃ vastram apagatakālakaṃ rañjanopagaṃ raṅge prakṣiptaṃ samyag eva raṅgaṃ pratigṛhṇāti,
K01vinv15_u:604: evam evānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tasminn eva āsane niṣaṇṇaś catvāry āryasatyāny abhisameti;
K01vinv15_u:605: tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārga iti;
K01vinv15_u:606: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā (MSV III 143)
K01vinv15_u:607: paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣo tīrṇavicikitsaḥ aparapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuś śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ
K01vinv15_u:608: yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjalim praṇamya bhagavantam idam (A 319b)
K01vinv15_u:612: upāsakam māṃ ca dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇāgatam abhiprasannam;
K01vinv15_u:613: atha bhagavān anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam āvocat:
K01vinv15_u:617: tato mām anāthapiṇṣado gṛhapatir anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir iti janaḥ sañjānīte;
K01vinv15_u:619: asti bhadanta prācīneṣu janapadeṣu śrāvastī nāma kosalānāṃ nigamaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:621: Anāthapiṇḍada invites the Buddha to Śrāvastī
K01vinv15_u:623: ahaṃ bhagavantam upasthāsyāmi yāvajjīvaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaglānapratyayabhaiṣaiyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena;
K01vinv15_u:626: yatra gṛhapate vihārāḥ santi tatra bhikṣava āgantavyaṃ gantavyaṃ vastavyaṃ manyante;
K01vinv15_u:628: ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā śrāvastyāṃ vihārā bhaviṣyanti;
K01vinv15_u:629: bhikṣavaś ca āgantavyaṃ gantavyaṃ vastavyaṃ maṃsyanta iti;
K01vinv15_u:631: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:632: tato 'sya yad rājagṛhe kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tat sarvaṃ kṛtvā pariprāpya (MSV III 144)
K01vinv15_u:634: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:636: anuprayaccha me bhagavan bhikṣuṃ sahāyakan yena sahāyakena śrāvastyāṃ bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ kārayāmīti;
K01vinv15_u:638: katarasya bhikṣor anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ saparivāro śrāvastīnivāsī ca janakāyo vidheyaḥ?
K01vinv15_u:641: samanvāhara śāriputra anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ saparivāraṃ śrāvastīnivāsinaṃ ca janakāyam iti;
K01vinv15_u:643: athāyuṣmāṃś chāriputro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt ptakrāntaḥ
K01vinv15_u:645: athāyuṣmāṃś chāriputras tasyā eva rātrer atyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya,
K01vinv15_u:647: rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrānto yathāparibhuktaṃ śayanāsanaṃ pratiśamayya,
K01vinv15_u:650: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ prabhūtaṃ śambalam ādāya ekaikarātrinivāsena śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:651: sa praviśann eva śrāvastīm ārāmeṇārāmam udyānenodyānam upavanenopavanaṃ caṅkramam anucaṅkramyamāṇo suvicarann evam āha:
K01vinv15_u:652: kataraḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati śrāvastyā nātidūre (Śay-v 19)
K01vinv15_u:656: jetasya kumarasyārāmam śrāvastyā nātidūre nātyāsanne divā alpākīṇam alpavilāpaṃ rātrāv alpaśabdṃ alpanirghoṣaṃ alpadaṃśamaśakavātātapasarīsṛpasparśam;
K01vinv15_u:659: sa praviśann eva svaṃ niveśanaṃ yena jetaḥ kumāras tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:662: ahaṃ tatra bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ kārayāmi iti;
K01vinv15_u:666: dvir api trir apy anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetaṃ kumāram idam avocat:
K01vinv15_u:670: punar apy anāthapiṇḍado gṛhaptir jetaṃ kumaram idam avocat:
K01vinv15_u:676: tau kṛtārgho na kṛtargha iti vivādam āpannau,
K01vinv15_u:679: ayam anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir udyukto bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ vihāraṃ māpayitum;
K01vinv15_u:683: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetaś ca kumāro vyāvahārikasakāśam upasaṅkrāntau;
K01vinv15_u:684: athānāthapiṇḍako gṛhapatir vyāvahārikapuruṣāṇām etam arthaṃ vistareṇa nivedayati;
K01vinv15_u:690: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ śakaṭair bhāraiḥ mūṭaiḥ piṭakair uṣṭrair gobhir gardabhaiḥ prabhūtaṃ suvarṇam abhinirhṛtya,
K01vinv15_u:694: tataḥ anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir etam arthaṃ cintayan muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīm asthāt;
K01vinv15_u:697: nātiprabhūtaṃ yena ayam anāstīrṇaḥ pṛthivīpradeśaḥ āstariṣyati;
K01vinv15_u:701: kasmād ārāmakāraṇād iyantaṃ mahāntaṃ dhanaskandhaṃ parityajāmi;
K01vinv15_u:703: avocat; sacet te ha gṛhapate vipratisāraḥ pratīccha suvarṇam;
K01vinv15_u:706: api tv aham etam evārtham anucintayan muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:714: yatredānīm ayaṃ gṛhapatir ārāmakāraṇād iyantaṃ mahāntaṃ dhanaskandhaṃ parityajati;
K01vinv15_u:715: iti viditvā anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
K01vinv15_u:718: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetasya kumārasya anāstīrṇaṃ pṛthivīpradeśam anuprayacchati;
K01vinv15_u:719: yatra jetaḥ kumāro bhagavato 'rthāya dvārakoṣṭhakaṃ māpayati
K01vinv15_u:721: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ māpayitum ārabdha iti tīvradveṣaparyākulīkṛtamanasas tīrthyās te saṃbhūya yenānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
K01vinv15_u:723: mā tvaṃ gṛhapate śramaṇasya gautamasya arthāyātra vihāraṃ kāraya;
K01vinv15_u:742: upasaṅkramyāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:743: ekantaniṣaṇṇo 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram idam avocat;

K01vinv15_u:1053: Previous births of Anāthapiṇḍada at the time of the seven Buddhas
K01vinv15_u:1054: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātaḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv15_u:1055: kutra bhadantānāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatināyaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaḥ pūrvakāṇāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ niryātitapūrvaḥ?
K01vinv15_u:1057: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣava ekanavate kalpe vipāśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
K01vinv15_u:1058: sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
K01vinv15_u:1060: tena khalu samayenāsyāṃ śrāvastyāṃ tiṣyo nāma gṛhapatir abhūt;

K01vinv15_u:1069: tadanubhāvād asau taṃ keśanakhastūpaṃ divā rātrau cānāvṛtaṃ paśyati;
K01vinv15_u:1071: yathāyaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo mama mātulena kumārasyāntikāt krītvā hiraṇyasuvarṇenāstīrya vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya niryātitaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1072: evam aham imam pṛthivīpradeśaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇenāstīrya saptānāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ niryātayeyam;

K01vinv15_u:1079: tena kyalu punaḥ samayena puṣyo nāma gṛhaptir abhūt;
K01vinv15_u:1080: tenāyaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo ardhatṛtīyān kośān maṇibhir āstīrya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya śikhinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1081: syāt khalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣyo nāma grhapatir abhūd iti?

K01vinv15_u:1084: tato 'rvak tasminn evaikatriṃśatime kalpe viśvabhuṅ nāma śāstā loka utpannaḥ pūrvavad yāvad buddho bhagavān;

K01vinv15_u:1093: tena khalu samayena bhavadatto nāma gṛhapatir abhūt;
K01vinv15_u:1094: tenāpy ayaṃ prādeśo gobhiḥ pūrayitvā kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya krakutsundasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya saśravakasaṃghasya niryātitaḥ;

K01vinv15_u:1101: tenāpy ayaṃ pradeśaḥ paṭṭair āstīrya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya niṣkrīya kanakamuneḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitāḥ;

K01vinv15_u:1113: etarhy apy ahaṃ bhikṣavaḥ śāstā loka utpannas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
K01vinv15_u:1114: sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyaśarathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
K01vinv15_u:1115: aham apy ardhatrayodaśaśataprivāra imaṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1116: etarhy apy anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā ṣoḍaśalāṅgalāvaktākoṭai saṃstareṇa saṃstīrya jetasya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya mama saśrāvakasaṃghasya
K01vinv15_u:1117: bhaviṣyati bhikṣavo 'nāgate 'py aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ maitreyo nāma śāstā ṣaṇṇavatyarhatkoṭīsahasraparivāra imaṃ pradeśam āgamiṣyati;
K01vinv15_u:1118: tena khalu samayena sudhano nāma gṛhapatir udbhaviṣyati;
K01vinv15_u:1119: so 'pīmaṃ pradeśaṃ trīṇi yojanāni hiraṇyasuvarṇenāstīrya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya maitreyasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātayiṣyati;
K01vinv15_u:1120: tasyaiva śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyati;
K01vinv15_u:1121: syāt khalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena sudhano nāma gṛhaptir abhūd iti?
K01vinv15_u:1123: api tv eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ sudhano nāma grhapatir udbhaviṣyati
K01vinv15_u:1124: Anāthapiṇḍada has the power to see absconded treasures,
K01vinv15_u:1125: no matter whether close or far away
K01vinv15_u:1126: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir nidhīn paśyati svāmikān apy asvāmikān api sthalagatān api jalagatān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike;
K01vinv15_u:1127: sāmantakena śabdo nisṛta anāthapiṇḍado gṛhaptir nidhīn paśyati sasvāmikān ḥapiḥ asvāmikān api sthalagatān api jalagatān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike iti;
K01vinv15_u:1128: tena khalu samayena saṃbahulānāṃ nānātīrthikaśramaṇabrāhmaṇacarakaparivrājakānāṃ kutūhalaśālāyāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ saṃnipatitānām ayam evaṃrūpo 'bhūd antarākathāsamudāhāraḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1129: katamena bhavanto lakṣaṇena samanvāgato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir nidhīn paśyati sasvāmikān apy asvāmikān api sthalagatān api jalagatān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py (Śay-v 31)
K01vinv15_u:1130: antike? tena khalu samayena upagur nāma māṇava tasyām eva parṣadi saṃnisaṇṇo 'bhūt saṃnipatitaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1133: ahaṃ vicārya bhavatām kathayiṣyāmi yena lakṣaṇena samanvāgato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir
K01vinv15_u:1134: nidhīn paśyati sasvāmikān apy asvamikān api sthalagatān api jalagatān api ye 'pi
K01vinv15_u:1136: so 'nāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateś cāravihārānveṣatatparaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho yāvad apareṇa samayenānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir nadyām ajiravatyāṃ snātvā uttīrṇaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1138: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ paśyann eva tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1140: vijñāto 'si gṛhapate kṣāntisauratyasamanvāgataḥ tvam yena nidhīn paśyasi sasvāmikān apy asvāmikān api sthalagatān api jalagatān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike iti;
K01vinv15_u:1144: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ kṣāntisauratyasamanvāgataḥ yena nidhīn paśyati
K01vinv15_u:1145: sasvāmikān apy asvāmikān api sthalagatān api jalagatān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike iti;
K01vinv15_u:1148: tīrthyakoṭiśatasahasreṇāpi bhikṣavo na sukaram ājñātuṃ yena lakṣaṇena samanvāgato
K01vinv15_u:1149: 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir nidhīn paśyati api tu ratnacitrāntakośo 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhaptir
K01vinv15_u:1150: hiraṇyeśvaraś ca yena nidhīn paśyati sasvāmikān apy asvāmikān api sthalagatān api
K01vinv15_u:1151: jalagatān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike
K01vinv15_u:1152: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv15_u:1153: kiṃ bhadānta anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena ratnacitrāntakośo hiranyeśvaraś ca saṃvṛttaḥ?
K01vinv15_u:1155: anāthapiṇḍadenaiva bhikṣavo gṛhapatinā karmāṇi kṛtyāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
K01vinv15_u:1156: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati;
K01vinv15_u:1157: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtany upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau ḥvipacyanteḥ nābdhātau
K01vinv15_u:1158: na tejodhātau na vāyudhātāv api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni
K01vinv15_u:1160: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
K01vinv15_u:1161: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām // (Śay-v 32)
K01vinv15_u:1162: The story of the Pratyekabuddha (concerning a previous life of Anāthapiṇḍada)
K01vinv15_u:1163: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo anyatarasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasty āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālapratigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito
K01vinv15_u:1164: sa saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukasārikākokilajīvajīvakanirghoṣite vanaṣaṇḍe sāntarjanena udyānabhūmiṃ nirgataḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1165: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya;
K01vinv15_u:1166: yāvad anyataro pratyekabuddho janapadacārikāṃ caraṃs taṃ karvaṭakam anuprāptaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1171: bhāgy ahaṃ yasya me udyāne tādṛśaḥ pravrajito 'vasthitaḥ iti prasādajātas taddarśanāya saṃprasthitaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1172: sa mahātmā nirupadhiśeṣam nirvāṇadhātuṃ praviśya parinirvṛtaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1173: tatas tena gṛhapatinā suhṛtsaṃbandhibāndhavāntarjanasahīyena mahatā satkāreṇa dhyāpitaḥ; sā (A 325a)
K01vinv15_u:1175: tāny asthīni sphaṭikamaye kumbhe ratnair vyāmiśrya prakṣiptāni;
K01vinv15_u:1176: tāny antaḥsthāny avabhāsante śabdaṃ ca kurvanti;
K01vinv15_u:1177: tatas tena pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam;
K01vinv15_u:1178: yathā tasyāsthīni ratnamiśrāṇy atyarthaṃ bhāsante śabdaṃ ca kurvanti evam evāham anena kuśalamūlena ratnacitrāntakośaḥ syāṃ hiraṇyeśvaraś ca
K01vinv15_u:1180: yo 'sau gṛhapatiḥ tena kālena tena samayena eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1181: yad anena pratyekabuddhe kārāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ yac ca tiṣyasya gṛhapates
K01vinv15_u:1182: bhāgineyena satā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya keśanakhastūpe avabhāsātmake maṇir
K01vinv15_u:1183: āropitaḥ tasya karmaṇo vipākena ratnacitrāntrakośo hiraṇyeśvaraś ca saṃvṛttaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1184: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklo vyatimiśrāṇām vyatimiśraḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1185: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ śikṣitavyam yat (Śay-v 33)
K01vinv15_u:1186: kṛṣṇāṇi karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitāvyam
K01vinv15_u:1188: tiṣyaḥ puṣyaś ca māghuś ca bhavadatto bṛhaspatiḥ /
K01vinv15_u:1189: āṣāḍhaś ca sudattaś ca sudhano bhavati paścimam //
K01vinv15_u:1190: hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca maṇimuktā tṛtīyakam /
K01vinv15_u:1191: gobhiḥ paṭair yavaiḥ koṭir hiraṇyena samucchritā //
K01vinv15_u:1193: yadānāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā koṭīsaṃstareṇa saṃstīrya jetasya kumārasya sakāśān
K01vinv15_u:1194: niṣkrīya buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya niryātitaṃ tadā nānādeśanivāsinaḥ śrāddhāś
K01vinv15_u:1197: ārya vayam apy āryasaṃghāya jetavane kiṃcid vastu kārayema –für kārayāma?
K01vinv15_u:1203: tathāpi tu yady etasmin pradeśe labhāmahe kārayāma iti
K01vinv15_u:1210: māmāgamya śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ saṃghasyārthāya puṇyakriyāvastu kurvanti anujānāmi;
K01vinv15_u:1224: āgantukānām arthāya anuddiṣṭaṃ vastu sthāpayitavyam iti;
K01vinv15_u:1229: tannivāsino bhikṣavaḥ saṃtrastā apravāritāḥ santaḥ śrāvastīm āgatāḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1230: te bhikṣubhiḥ pratiśrāmitāḥ mārgaśrame prativinodite kathayanti:
K01vinv15_u:1234: katham idānīṃ yūyam āyuṣmantaḥ sthitasya eva śāstuḥ śāsanam antardhāpayatha;
K01vinv15_u:1235: yady asti vo kaukṛtyaṃ yathāvṛddhikayā prayacchata śayanāsanam iti;
K01vinv15_u:1239: tasmād anujānāmi bhaṅgikabhagnakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya dvitīyā varṣopanāyikā kartavyā iti;
K01vinv15_u:1243: traimāsikī pravāraṇā kartavyā śrāvaṇamāse tu dvitīyā varṣopanāyikā kartavyā iti;
K01vinv15_u:1245: bhaṅgibhagnakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya dvitīyā varṣopanāyikā kartavyā iti
K01vinv15_u:1246: yāvad apare 'pi bhaṅgibhagnakā bhikṣavaḥ śrāvastīm āgatāḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1249: bhaṅgibhagnakān mayā bhikṣavo bhikṣūn āgamya dvitīyā varṣopanāyikā prajñaptā,
K01vinv15_u:1250: na tṛtīyā; bhaṅgibhagnakās tu bhikṣavaḥ yathāsaṃstutikayā viśrāmayitavyāḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1259: āmiṣalābhas teṣāṃ no tu vastralābha iti (Śay-v 35)
K01vinv15_u:1266: sarve uddeṣṭavyāḥ pratyekam ekaikasya dvau trayaś catvāro vā yathāpramāṇataḥ sarve paribhoktavyāḥ,
K01vinv15_u:1271: bhikṣavas te punaḥ karma na kurvanti pralubhyante;
K01vinv15_u:1274: sa vai saṃpadyata ity evaṃ kuśalam,
K01vinv15_u:1276: na cet śakyate yāvatāṃ śakyate tāvatāṃ saṃskāraḥ kartavyaḥ,
K01vinv15_u:1278: yadā bhagavataḥ vaistārikaṃ saṃvṛttaṃ tadā bahavo bhikṣavaḥ śrāvastīm āgatāḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1281: dvayos trayāṇām coddeṣṭavyam antataḥ sarveṣāṃ sāmānyena niṣadanaprāmāṇikam uddeṣṭavyam udakasthālakasthānapānīyabhaiṣajyadantakāṣṭhapātrasthānaṃ
K01vinv15_u:1282: sāmīcī ca parasparam upacāras tu sāmānya eva noddeṣṭavya iti
K01vinv15_u:1289: bhūta iti; āraṇyakatvasya ca bahudhā varṇo bhāṣitaḥ
K01vinv15_u:1290: tadā kecid bhikṣava āraṇyakatvaṃ samādāya araṇye 'dhyavasthitāḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1292: muṣitāḥ santaḥ brāhmaṇagṛhapatikulebhyaś cīvarārthaṃ paryeṣṭim āpadyamānāḥ riṃcanty uddeśaṃ pāṭham svādhyāyaṃ yogaṃ manasikāram;
K01vinv15_u:1295: āraṇyakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya vastu sthāpayitavyam iti;
K01vinv15_u:1297: āraṇyakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya vastu sthāpayitavyam iti;
K01vinv15_u:1299: āraṇyako bhikṣuḥ pātracīvaraṃ sthāpayitvā dvāraṃ baddhvā tāḍakam ādāya prakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1302: prakāśe sthāne āraṇyakānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ vastu sthāpayitavyam iti;
K01vinv15_u:1305: yo bhikṣur āgantuka āgacchati tasmai vastu dadāti lābhaṃ tv ātmanā gṛhṇāti;
K01vinv15_u:1315: prativasa; yo 'tra lābhaḥ sa mama iti;
K01vinv15_u:1321: so 'py upanandasya sakāśād yācitvā tasmin vihāre 'vasthitaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1323: tenāsau saṃmṛṣṭaḥ saṃkāraṃ chorayitvā saṃmārjanīṃ gṛhītvaiva saṃkārakuṭasamīpe 'vasthitaḥ,
K01vinv15_u:1330: tena na kadācit saṃmārjanīpadam api dattam iti;
K01vinv15_u:1334: yāvat tenāsau piṇḍapātam aṭatā dṛṣṭa upālabdhaś ca;
K01vinv15_u:1336: upanando lābhaṃ gṛhṇāti ahaṃ tasya vihāraṃ śodhayāmi?
K01vinv15_u:1337: iti; etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti;
K01vinv15_u:1339: yo lābhaṃ gṛhṇāti tena vihāraḥ saṃmārṣṭavyaḥ iti
K01vinv15_u:1341: abhyatītakālagatānāṃ dānapatīnām nāmnā dakṣiṇā ādeṣṭavyā iti;
K01vinv15_u:1347: ārya yady ahaṃ vihāraṃ kārayāmi mamāpi nāmnā dakṣiṇām uddiśasi iti;
K01vinv15_u:1356: na tatra kaścid bhikṣuḥ prativasati iti;
K01vinv15_u:1362: nāham etat saṃdhāya kathayāmi api tu tatra lābho nāsti iti;
K01vinv15_u:1364: ārya idānīṃ yo madīye vihāre prativasati tam ahaṃ paṭenācchādayāmi;
K01vinv15_u:1365: iti lābho labhyate iti upanandena anupūrveṇa svabhāga iva udgṛhītaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1368: yāvad anyatamaḥ piṇḍapātiko caityābhivandakaḥ śrāvastīm āgataḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1373: sāṃghiko 'yaṃ vihāraḥ kiṃ tūpanandasya bhikṣor uddiṣṭa iti;
K01vinv15_u:1387: kāyasya bhedāt sugato svargaloke deveṣūpapadyata iti;
K01vinv15_u:1388: ye taṃ vihāram upaliptasaṃmṛṣṭaṃ paśyanti te tasya gṛhapater gatvā ārocayanti;
K01vinv15_u:1390: yāvad apareṇa samayena svayam evāgataḥ paśyati tathaiva taṃ vihāram upaliptasaṃmṛṣṭam;
K01vinv15_u:1398: lābhātmako 'yaṃ yadi na dāsyāmi tathāpy ayaṃ balād grahīṣyati māṃ ca vihārān niṣkāsayiṣyati iti;
K01vinv15_u:1402: yasya prasannaḥ prasannādhikāraṃ karoti tasyaiva sa;
K01vinv15_u:1404: guṇapriyo lokaḥ prapīḍya prapīḍyātmānaṃ sa putradāraṃ ca;
K01vinv15_u:1407: āraṇyakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām antargṛhe bhoktuṃ gatānām adattādāyikair vihārā muṣyante;
K01vinv15_u:1409: dvāraṃ baddhvā kuñcikām ādāya prakramitavyam iti;
K01vinv15_u:1419: yadi kathayati sajvara iti na moktavyam;
K01vinv15_u:1421: api tv āraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā ardhaśākhā upasthāpayitavyā iti;
K01vinv15_u:1424: bhikṣavo na jānīte kedṛśī ardhaśākhā iti;
K01vinv15_u:1426: kukkuro bhikṣavo ardhaśākhā tasya pātraśeṣaṃ dātavyam;
K01vinv15_u:1428: te stūpāṅgaṇaṃ vihāraṃ ca nakharikābhir upalikhanti uccāraprasrāveṇa nāśayanti;
K01vinv15_u:1432: kukkurapoṣakena bhikṣuṇā kālyam evotthāya stūpāṅgaṇaṃ vihāraś ca pratyavekṣitavyaḥ yan nakharikābhir upalikhitaṃ tat samaṃ kartavyam;
K01vinv15_u:1434: kukkurapoṣako bhikṣur yathāprajñaptān āsamudācārikān dharmān asamādāya vartate,
K01vinv15_u:1440: mayā nāmeha vihāre saṃghasthavireṇa bhūtvā dvitīyasthavireṇa bhavitavyam;
K01vinv15_u:1444: tasmin yo dvitīyasthavirasya lābha sa saṃghasthavirasya;
K01vinv15_u:1448: kiṃ vinā prayojanena saṃghasthaviratvaṃ karomi iti;
K01vinv15_u:1449: sa punas tvaritatvaritam eva vihāraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ;
K01vinv15_u:1455: āyuṣmanta kiṃ tiṣṭhata eva śāstuḥ śāsanam antardhāpayata,
K01vinv15_u:1459: yaḥ saṃghikena vā staupikena ḥvāḥ karaṇīyena gato bhavati tasya śayanāsanaṃ yathāvṛddhikayā uddeṣṭavyam,
K01vinv15_u:1461: upananda atilobhena dvayor vihārayor varṣā upagataḥ ubhayavaihārikaṃ lābhaṃ lapsayata iti sa vṛttāsu varṣāsu lābhaṃ prārthayate naitasmin labhyate nāpy aparasmin;
K01vinv15_u:1471: uhayavihārayor varṣoṣitaḥ kimartham ekasamād dīyate iti;
K01vinv15_u:1475: na ca punar bhikṣuṇā dvayor vihārayor upagantavyaṃ;
K01vinv15_u:1481: ācaritam tasya gṛhapter varṣoṣitasya bhikṣusaṃghasya ekaikaṃ bhikṣuṃ paṭenācchādayitum;
K01vinv15_u:1482: sa paṭakān ādāya āraṇyakānāṃ vihāraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ;
